channel.title: Making links in posts more prominent
channel.description: Does this software allow for light CSS modification? If so, can we set links in the posts to have a dashed underline or some other indication that it's a link? The slight color difference that separates links right now is a bit too subtle (or it could be my color-blindness).

item.title: Making links in posts more prominent
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
That works for me. Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Making links in posts more prominent

item.title: Making links in posts more prominent
item.dc:creator: imsickofmaps
item.description:
I’ve added a dashed line on ones in the body of posts… does that work better for you? More info here if you want to do more mods.

Read full topic
item.source: Making links in posts more prominent

item.title: Making links in posts more prominent
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
Yeah I agree, I don’t know if by default they’re trying to de-emphasize them but they seem too light for sure.
